OOC: Again i'm posting from rAuq's e-mail address.

Wildrider continued to swerve in and out of the forest taking trees 
with him, staying just behind his insane cohort. He opened up a 
comm-link to contact Speedbreaker. "Yo Breaker, you want we 
should hurry up?" he asked. His radio replied in static, then gave a 
sentence, "Yes," replied Speedbreaker. "Swing, or swerve you 
mecha turkey, by the base, leave Drag Strip to guard, and come to 
these coordinates. We need the cargo space." After Speedbreaker 
had finished and closed the link, Wilrider still decided to complain. 
"Ahh, I didn't sign up for transportation duty, i'm a terrorist" but as 
they sped forward, he knew Motormaster would rip out his laser 
core if he refused.
